item.title: Staying Stuck in Emacs
item.description: I recently saw this post, The values of Emacs, the Neovim revolution, and the VSCode gorilla, pop up on HackerNews (I know, it’s terrible there), and it really captured why I feel stuck to a degree in Emacs despite the other genuinely good options out there. For context, I use Doom Emacs as my distribution of choice: Evil Mode is great and it’s fast. I’m also interested in checking out Centaur Emacs at some point.
